message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I'm asking for $15,000.  I'm confident you'll find this to be a fair price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I believe we can come to an agreement closer to my budget. I would like to propose a price of $10,000 for the product.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your perspective on the price.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000? This reflects the true value of the product.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $12,000 for the product.
